types:type.name: inputjson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type inputjson = Array<{| customerid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstname: String, city: String, state: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"customerid\\\":5,\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"Raja\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"AP\\\"},{\\\"customerid\\\":6,\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"Raja\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"AP\\\"}]"}
